title: Ookami-tachi no Shiikuhou
original_name: オオカミたちの飼育法
sinopse:
Her parents decided to go overseas and she's to live in the house of her father’s friend. "In that luxury mansion, there are beautiful boys!" she thought for a brief moment. But these two brothers are trying to get her out of the house and things happen to be taken a little too far...!?

(Source: Chibi Manga)
